text_block_list.name: Father's Coach
text_block_list.text:
……It's fine. It's not a problem. You worked harder 
than anyone else, so there's no need to be nervous——

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
——I understand, coach. However, I can feel it clearly. 
I'm less experienced than anyone. I don't know anything……!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Father……this video you just showed me……

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……Dura. 
That you truly look up to and respect us, I understand that.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text: And that, like us, you're aiming to become the "Strongest". But, you see——

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
The ones you look up to. Us, and the Uma Musume too. 
In the beginning, none of them were called the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes they were unprepared, or had their 
weaknesses exposed. Sometimes they were overcome 
by nervousness……but they gradually grew stronger.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……You don't have to be perfect from the start. Rather, 
if there are things you are lacking, find out what they are.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
That would help out your instructors. ……Isn't 
that right, Trainer-san? Once you've found what 
you're weak at, you can strategize around it.
choice_data_list: Yes, that's how you can get stronger

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……See? It's fine. 
That's why it's okay, Dura.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……Oh, look at the time. 
Hey, Dura.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text: Why did you choose this person as your Dance escort?

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text: Why did you choose this person as your Dance escort?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……! W-well, that's——

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
……you forgot until the last minute, and they 
were the one that offered to help, am I right?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: How did you——!?

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
Hahahaa. It's you, after all. You were so 
preoccupied thinking you had to dance perfectly 
for the party that you only focused on practice, right?

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't stop thinking about that either. ……And about how I could 
tell you this. As your father, about how I should advise you.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Father.

text_block_list.name: Dura's Father
text_block_list.text:
Even the way you sought help was the same. 
Like father, like daughter, right?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……I'll be fine from here. 
That you were there today really helped.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Yes…………

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……Trainer. 
Father was praising you.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: (……I should be the one thanking them.)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
(Father said it. 
……Someone like you is indispensable)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……I was planning on entering the next Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
I thought it was necessary to win 
first place before debuting. But, now——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……even if you were to change your mind, 
I would still want you to be my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: I want to ask for your help again.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
To the "Imperfect Me", you reached out. 
I want to run together with you in the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Trainer Wearing Red Lipstick
text_block_list.text:
W-why is Duramente with that rookie!? In the last Selection 
Race, it didn't seem like she was interested in being scouted!

text_block_list.name: Stylish Trainer
text_block_list.text:
We'll find out the reason during this mock race, won't we? 
And how things will go after this……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Suuu-……Fuuu-……

text_block_list.name: Previous Generation Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: To think you'd be taking a deep breath. Are you nervous?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Yes. A little.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
But, I won't try to hide it anymore. 
I know now that showing it openly will help me get stronger.

text_block_list.name: Gate Trainer
text_block_list.text:
To all the participating Uma Musume, please enter your gates! 
Are you all ready? Well then——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
(……In this race, many people will be gauging me. 
The strength of Duramente. The strength of someone 
who has inherited the blood of the "Strongest")

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
(I'm sweating. My face is a mess. My heart is pounding. 
Everyone must be seeing the imperfect me. But, even then——)

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …………In the next moments……I will become stronger……!

Duramente accelerated. Faster, and faster. 
With a speed that nobody could catch——
——This is where Duramente becoming the "Strongest" would begin.
